title: Ciara and La La Anthony put on a stylish display at beauty brand IPSY's first live event
text:
They are friends from way back.

And on Friday, Ciara and La La Anthony had a super stylish moment as they arrived for subscription beauty brand IPSY's very first live panel discussion in New York City.

The 33-year-old songstress rocked a golden brown coat that she wore over a matching vest, roll neck sweater and wide leg pants.

Color co-ordinated: Ciara, 33, rocked a golden brown coat that she wore over a matching vest, roll neck sweater and wide leg pants.

Her long brunette hair was center parted and cascaded over her shoulders

La La, 38, made a splash in a skin-tight body suit patterned with images of the sea and waves crashing in a multitude of shades of blue and white.

The Power star and best-selling author smoothed her raven black tresses back into an updo revealing her trendy hoop earrings.

Beautiful besties: Ciara leaned on La La Anthony's shoulder outside the venue for IPSY event

The TV personality is also Kim Kardashian West's best friend.

Ciara, whose full name is Ciara Princess Harris, recently teamed up with IPSY to star in its new Discover Yourself campaign, in which she dishes about finding her 'truest self.'

'I say I'm a woman of ambition on a mission,' the chart-topper explains in the video campaign.

Eye-catching outfit: La La, 40, made a splash in a skin-tight body suit patterned with images of the sea and waves crashing in a multitude of shades of blue and white

'And I realize that when I do embrace challenges and kind of push myself that I really actually grow, I actually discover something new about myself.

'I'm in a place right now where I do feel like I'm my truest self. It's taken me a long time to get here and I'm really proud of the not-so-perfect moments too, because they make me who I am today.'

Ciara headlines the campaign, which is set to feature nine women, all of whom will share their personal stories about self discovery through the same kind of candid videos.
description: The old friends had a super stylish moment as they arrived at the subscription beauty service's very first live panel discussion, posing outside the venue in New York City on Friday.
